July 22, 1905 D York Contest
York Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
york-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
York, North Yorkshire, England, UK Horticultural Show promoted by workers at Rowntrees Cocoa Works, York Test pieces: "Gems of Mendelssohn", "La Cenerentola", "Mikado" and "Gems of Irish Melody" 1st prize £20, 2nd prize £12,3rd prize £8,4th prize £6,5th prize £4, 6th prize £2. 8 bands competed.
Feb. 13, 2012, 4:57 p.m. Sept. 7, 2018, 11:25 a.m.
